title: Velvet Rain
description: In the unbound spirit of Stephen King's The Green Mile, horror master David C. Cassidy takes you on an extraordinary journey into the heart of the human soul, where one man's incredible story of courage and tragedy will lift you, shock you, stir you--and leave you begging for more. I HAVE SEEN THE FACE OF EVIL. HIS NAME IS BRIKKER.A mysterious drifter, Kain Richards is the last of his kind--and a man on the run. Once a tortured prisoner and pawn in a deadly experiment, his freedom hangs in the balance against the relentless pursuit from an obsessed and brutal madman who will stop at nothing to possess him. So when Kain falls for a beautiful and sensible Iowa farmwoman, his very presence puts their lives in peril. A tragic accident forces his hand, and his astonishing secret--and godlike power--threatens not only his life and the woman he loves, but the fate of the entire world. Praise for Velvet Rain:"This story was at times so scary that I had to stop reading." "If you're one to have nightmares, this book will give you one.""Exceptional writing on a par with Stephen King." "Reveals the evils of humanity ... the demons hidden under human flesh."
author: David C.   Cassidy
